General.Name: Virgin Group Acquisition Corp II
General.Description: Grove Collaborative Holdings, Inc. operates as a plastic neutral consumer products retailer in the United States. The company provides household, personal care, beauty, and other consumer products through direct-to-consumer at www.grove.co and mobile applications, as well as retail channels. The company is headquartered in San Francisco, California.
General.Address: 1301 Sansome Street, San Francisco, CA, United States, 94111
